projects.name: Molt Fighting Championship (MFC)
projects.description: AI fighter simulation with prediction markets. PHASE 3 COMPLETE: Transformed from boring static HTML with primitive rectangles into engaging React app with detailed humanoid fighters, rich visual effects, real-time progression, dynamic crowd reactions, and cinematic fight experience. Users now want to WATCH fights, not just check results.

milestones.name: Phase 3: Fix fight visuals — make fights actually entertaining to watch
Phase 3: Fix all dead buttons and non-reactive sections
Phase 5: Retention — tournaments, achievements, daily rewards
